content: लांछनं [लांछ्-कर्मणि ल्युट्] {@--1@} A sign, mark, token, characteristic mark; नवांबुदानीकमुहूर्तलांछने (धनुषि) <ls>R. 3. 53</ls>; <ls>U. 4. 20</ls>; <ls>Mv. 1. 18</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘marked with’, ‘characterized by’ &c.; जातेऽथ देवस्य तया विवाहमहोत्सवे साहसलांछनस्य <ls>Vikr. 10. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 18</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 84</ls>; so श्रीकंदपदलांछनः <ls>Māl. 1</ls> ‘bearing the characteristic epithet श्रीकंठ.’ {@--2@} A name, an appellation. {@--3@} A stain, stigma, a mark of ignominy. {@--4@} The spot on the moon; <ls>Ku. 7. 35.</ls> {@--5@} A landmark.
